entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carignan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.6°C

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
